  "title": "Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)",
  "description": "Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.",
  "OB": "When selecting both projects P1 and P2, notice that the Open Project menu item is available but the Close Project option is not.",
  "EB": "After creating two projects, P1 and P2, select P2 and try to close it.",
  "SR": "1. Create two projects, P1 and P2.
2. Select project P2.
3. Attempt to close project P2."
}
